title: i can`t get my alistar free skin :@@:@
body: i copy paste the code and don`t work i type it without copy pasteing it still don`t work :@:@

replies.body: As DarkenedAuras said, please [shoot us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and Player Support will be able to help you out. :)

the Alistar, the Tristana, and the Garen skins are all not working.

Send in a ticket asking for it and they'll do it no problem. Worked for me.
